publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology "

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Job 26
ab.l: Da qaruv b́erdi Ijov da ajtty.
Ńe boluštujmo ḱuč́śuźǵa qutḥardyjmo b́uĺagiń ḱuč́śuźńuń.
Ńe keńaš́ b́erdijmo ussuzɣa da abrajlyḥnymo ḱopĺarǵa biĺdirdijmo.
Kimǵa anlattyjmo śoźĺar da ǯany kimniń čyḥtymo śeńd́ań.

Ol gehinomdaɣylar jaratyldylar
t́ub́uńd́ań suvlarnyn da toḥtavčularynyn.
Jalanɣačtyr ǵor qaršysyna anyn da joḥtur qaplav taspolɣan jerǵa.
Quruvču cafonnu boš üśt́uńa taɣuvču jerni joḥ üśt́uńa.
T́uv́uńč́ukĺav́č́́u suvlarny bulutlarynda da jarylmejdyr bulut t́upĺarińd́a.
Kipĺejdir juźĺariń taḥtnyn jajadyr anyn üśt́uńa bulutun.
Resim č́ekĺadi juźu üśt́uńa suvlarnyn učuna d́ejiń jaryḥnyn qaranɣy byla.
Baɣanalary ḱokĺarniń titrejdirĺar da alɣasandyrlar ačuvundan.
Ḱuč́u byla jardy t́eńgiźni da aqyly byla keśti Mićrini.
Alhemi byla ḱokĺarni jaratty joḥtan bar et́ti qudraty qačḥynčy ylanny.
Muna bular bir ńeč́aĺari jollarynyn da ńe kiči nerśad́a anlasaḥ edi anda da ḱopĺuǵuń baɣatyrlyɣyn kim anlajalyr.
